short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust playback speed for any video and up to 600% volume boost for any video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Video Controller allows to increase or decrease playback sped on any video.

Video Controller allows to up to 600% volume boost.

🚀 Video Speed Features:

🎥 Work almost anywhere

🎥 Up to 800 % video speed

🚀 Video Volume Features:

⭐️ Up to 600 % volume boost

⭐️ Control volume of any tab

⭐️ Fine-grained control: 0 % - 600 %

🚀 Full screen

Chrome prevents you from going to a complete full-screen when using any extension manipulating with sound so you can always see the blue rectangle icon in the tab bar (to be aware of audio is being manipulated). There's no way to bypass it and after all it's a good thing that keeps you safe. However you can improve the situation a bit by pressing F11 (on Windows) or Ctr+Cmd+F (on Mac).

🔓 Unlock Premium Member Features

👑 Video speed up to 1600% or what you customize.

👑 Video volume up to 800% or what you customize.

👑 More features in the future.
